WRITING.TITLE: Organizations dedicated to the promotion of literacy.
WRITING.TEXT: What are some organizations dedicated to the promotion of literacy, via book donation, in regions of the world where literacy is scarce?

WRITING.TITLE: What are some organizations dedicated to the donation of books for the promotion of literacy in regions of the world where literacy is scarce?

WRITING.TEXT: His book *Ghost In The Wires* is well worth the read. It is both exciting and humorous.

I may be able to have my doctor take a look at them, but I have some moles that need inspection. One is exhibiting a bump on it which is new. The others aren't but I would feel comfortable having them looked at.
